item.description: Our Home Field: DOWNES FIELD BROOKLINE FROM RTE 128: take Rte. 9 East for 6 miles. At Volkswagen Dealer take right on Cypress St. Go to blinking light and take left on High St., then first right on Highland Ave. FROM BOSTON: Rte. 9 West go 1 mile past Rte.1 overpass. Take left at Volkswagen Dealer onto Cypress St. Go to blinking light and take left on High St. then first right on Highland Ave.

group.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group

item.name: FEBRUARY MEETUP
